title: Trump Deploys National Guard to DC
description: "Balance of Power: Late Edition" focuses on the intersection of politics and global business. On today's show, Rep. Raja Krishnamoorthi (D-IL) shares his thoughts on President Trump extending the China tariff truce for 90 days. Michael Gerhardt, Distinguished Professor of Jurisprudence at UNC School of Law, talks about President Trump abusing his authority with his takeover of the Washington, DC police. Jane Harman, former US Democratic Representative of California, shares her thoughts on what to expect Friday as President Trump and President Putin are expected to meet and discuss the war in Ukraine. (Source: Bloomberg)

argos_summary: President Trump has announced the deployment of the National Guard to Washington, D.C., citing a perceived rise in crime, despite statistics indicating a 30-year low in violent crime in the city. This move allows him to take control of local police under the Home Rule Act, which has raised concerns among local officials and experts about the legality and necessity of such actions.
